column4: I have some problem using my wlan nic (dlink dwl-520+). Ubuntu has the acx100 module and the firmware i need. Tried to get an ip from dhcp, but it does't work, set ip mannually did't work either. dhcp works fine in windows. tip?
isn't the dwl520+ a atheros radio?
ie a radio made by atheros? and handled by the madwifi driver?
